about_the_game:
After long years of labor, Maurice was finally able to treat himself to the cruise of his dreams. A brand new concept, which promises great thrills as you approach a mysterious region of the universe: the Exot galaxy!

Following the incompetence of the crew on board, our hero finds himself stranded with his escape pod on an unknown planet, with no hope of leaving...

C.L.I.C., YOUR BEST FRIEND

The manufacturers of your Compact Loyal Integrated Console (C.L.I.C.) have locked certain features: unlock them to access new resources and improve its performance to be able survive in the Exot galaxy.

YOUR SHIP, A CUSTOMIZED BASE

You begin your adventure in an escape pod: you will be safe there, even it is not fully functional. Transform it into a truly tailor-made base by adding new rooms, grow rooms, etc. Convert it into a ship by adding engines and anti-G systems, and take off.

EXPLORE THE GALAXY

Each planet in the Exot galaxy contains specific resources that you will need to progress. To achieve this, several paths are available to you: some are easy, others will challenge you.

EVOLVING WORKSHOPS

Workshops will allow you to craft many items and resources: feed them with fuel, automate them, improve their performance and try to unlock all the available recipes.

MAKE ENCOUNTERS

Domesticate the local fauna, do business with merchants, confront various hostile entities to try to find a place for yourself in this little-known galaxy.

THE MASTER OF THE PLACE

During your first trip into Hyperspace, you risk having an astonishing encounter. A legendary entity awaits you there: the Catgo. It will test you through a series of quests to complete. The rewards you earn will open new doors for you…

FEATURES

  • Survival : survive the hostile environment

  • Evolution : unlock new skills and features

  • Base Building : customize and expand your base as you want

  • Space Exploration : equip your ship to travel the galaxy

  • Crafting : build the workshops and resources necessary for your survival

  • Farming : breed animals and cultivate the local flora

  • Mining : search for the most precious minerals

  • Combat : face the hostile creatures that roam its lands

  • Quests : complete the quests assigned by the Chargot

  • Adjustable game difficulty

  • Configurable Game Options : display, quality, controls, fonts, colors, etc.

short_description: Discover a still unexplored region of space: the Exot galaxy. With your C.L.I.C. as your only ally, obtain the resources necessary for your survival. Develop your ship, improve your workshops, face creatures to conquer these hostile lands.
